page.title: 20Burnaston Airfield-2
page.content: expand. Unfortunately because of the nearby A38 trunk road it was virtually impossible to increase runways to cater for larger and more up to date planes. After much thought and many meetings with neighbouring Counties Nottingham and Leicester it was decided to move to Castle Donington and open the East Midlands Airport which is now an extremely busy International port. Since then the buildings and hangers have been used as a small Industrial site. Recently plans have been approved to start, once more, a local flying school at Burnaston airfield.
